StringTable.Label: Ship_Elembrial_Dec
StringTable.String: This warship projects shields for all ships in its fleet.

StringTable.Label: Ship_FloatingFortress_Dec
StringTable.String: The science ship of the Mercenary Crane.

StringTable.Label: Ship_GoldenBazaar_Dec
StringTable.String: Always seeking out new business opportunites.

StringTable.Label: Ship_Nail_Dec
StringTable.String: A small but sturdy precursor warship.

StringTable.Label: Ship_CosmosDread_Dec
StringTable.String: The "flagship" of the great pirate Starbeard. Little more than a asteroid miner with a gun.

StringTable.Label: Ship_TheArc_Dec
StringTable.String: Filled with flora and fauna from around the galaxy, this a flying ecology lab.

StringTable.Label: Ship_Praxis_Dec
StringTable.String: The warship of the brutal and malevolent LL-88.

StringTable.Label: Ship_Prospector_Dec
StringTable.String: There are things out there that you would not believe.

StringTable.Label: Ship_Independence_Dec
StringTable.String: A ship known to seek freedom and adventure in the open expanse.

StringTable.Label: Ship_Enforcer_Dec
StringTable.String: Citizens are compelled to work hard under the oppressive shadow of this menacing vessel.

StringTable.Label: Ship_Goodwill_Dec
StringTable.String: A symbol of peace known throughout the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: Ship_Negotiator_Dec
StringTable.String: Where you negotiate is just as important as what you negotiate.

StringTable.Label: Ship_Zarkov_Dec
StringTable.String: Things happen on this ship. Only a black light will tell the tale.

StringTable.Label: Ship_Sander_Name_Dec
StringTable.String: The galaxy is filled with things. Let's go get them.

StringTable.Label: Ship_Raptor_Dec
StringTable.String: This experimental warship was designed by trillionaire E.G. Arms. The components used in its construction are the result of his life's work, though tragically he died before construction began.

StringTable.Label: Ship_Retribution_Dec
StringTable.String: Reconstructed from parts that were scattered across the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: Ship_Sabre_Dec
StringTable.String: The small and beam resistant warship of the Mercenary Prince Viturian.

StringTable.Label: Ship_Splinter_Dec
StringTable.String: Other probes explore the universe. This probe deconstructs anything it finds along the way.

StringTable.Label: Ship_Stargazer_Dec
StringTable.String: A precursor probe that has been recently reactivated.

StringTable.Label: Ship_Whisper_Dec
StringTable.String: The administrative ship of the Mercenary Retuio III.

StringTable.Label: Ship_Ysengard_Dec
StringTable.String: The armed ship of the Mirazu Ysen.

StringTable.Label: Ship_Bacchanal_Dec
StringTable.String: The raucous party barge of the Mercenary Annjeanette Sil.

StringTable.Label: Tier2MercenaryShip02_Dec
StringTable.String: The incredibly resilient Colony Ship of the Mercenary Kootu Erji.

StringTable.Label: Tier2MercenaryShip05_Dec
StringTable.String: The freighter of the resilient mercenary Fitrios Pompados.

StringTable.Label: Tier2MercenaryShip06_Dec
StringTable.String: The Precursor-researching science ship of the Mercenary Dr. Jondi Ians.

StringTable.Label: Tier2MercenaryShip07_Dec
StringTable.String: The approval boosting planetary Support Ship of the Mercenary Inquisitor.

StringTable.Label: Tier2MercenaryShip08_Dec
StringTable.String: The economy boosting planetary Support Ship of the Mercenary Kalli Datun.

StringTable.Label: Tier2MercenaryShip09_Dec
StringTable.String: The research boosting planetary Support Ship of the Mercenary Melkiur Savante.

StringTable.Label: Tier2MercenaryShip10_Dec
StringTable.String: The influence boosting planetary Support Ship of the Mercenary Ghhhhhhsk.

StringTable.Label: Tier2MercenaryShip11_Dec
StringTable.String: The influence boosting planetary Support Ship of the Mercenary Master of Tongues.

StringTable.Label: Tier2MercenaryShip16_Dec
StringTable.String: The powerful missile warship of the Mercenary Admiral Waro.

StringTable.Label: Tier2MercenaryShip17_Dec
StringTable.String: The powerful beam warship of the Mercenary, The Night Fist.

StringTable.Label: Tier2MercenaryShip21_Dec
StringTable.String: The evasion and accuracy boosting Support Ship of the Mercenary Strafford Leet.

StringTable.Label: Tier2MercenaryShip22_Dec
StringTable.String: The mass-driver negating Support Ship of the Mercenary Ban Seurt of Illia.

StringTable.Label: Tier2MercenaryShip23_Dec
StringTable.String: The military production boosting planetary Support Ship of the Mercenary Yiyiz Ziyiy.

StringTable.Label: Tier2MercenaryShip24_Dec
StringTable.String: The salvage ship of the Mercenary Evelon Masha.

StringTable.Label: Tier3MercenaryShip01_Dec
StringTable.String: The Starbase boosting Support Ship of the Mercenary Laqt Reecher.

StringTable.Label: Tier3MercenaryShip02_Dec
StringTable.String: The terraforming ship of the Mercenary The Last Boyar.

StringTable.Label: Tier3MercenaryShip03_Dec
StringTable.String: The mysterious Constructor Ship of the Mercenary ruire podaq nu.

StringTable.Label: Tier3MercenaryShip09_Dec
StringTable.String: The overstuffed carrier of the Mercenary Flockeader Jat.

StringTable.Label: Tier3MercenaryShip13_Dec
StringTable.String: The powerful and balanced warship of the Mercenary Poelacca.

StringTable.Label: Tier3MercenaryShip14_Dec
StringTable.String: The massive and jamming-equipped carrier of the Mercenary XRT80-DEF.

StringTable.Label: Tier3MercenaryShip15_Dec
StringTable.String: The Dreadnought of the Mercenary Enopriumta Xu.

StringTable.Label: Tier3MercenaryShip16_Dec
StringTable.String: The powerful beam cruiser of the Mercenary The Elder Kriat.

StringTable.Label: Tier3MercenaryShip18_Dec
StringTable.String: The powerful Prototype warship of the Mercenary Hon Malteuse.

StringTable.Label: Tier3MercenaryShip19_Dec
StringTable.String: The speed and range boosting Support Ship of the Mercenary Kelpie Wittque.

StringTable.Label: Tier3MercenaryShip20_Dec
StringTable.String: The defense-boosting Support Ship of the Mercenary Brootus.

StringTable.Label: Tier3MercenaryShip21_Dec
StringTable.String: The Prototype warship of the Mercenary Shade.

StringTable.Label: Tier3MercenaryShip22_Dec
StringTable.String: The well armed and armored assault ship of the Mercenary Slim Tuir.

StringTable.Label: PirateSpaceMonsterTiny_Dec
StringTable.String: Creatures from another dimension, drawn to places of power and loss.

StringTable.Label: PirateSpaceMonsterSmall_Dec
StringTable.String: Hunters from another dimension who tear apart ships and feast on their energy systems.

StringTable.Label: PirateSpaceMonsterMedium_Dec
StringTable.String: Drawn to dying suns, and the shattered worlds they leave behind.

StringTable.Label: PirateSpaceMonsterLarge_Dec
StringTable.String: Nearly ever alien species shares a common mythology of a horrific visit from one of these creatures.

StringTable.Label: PirateSpaceMonsterHuge_Dec
StringTable.String: Fortunately rare, the queen's presence brings madness and death.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Victory_Dec
StringTable.String: A prototype attack ship. Dangerous and fast, if we can find someone willing to pilot it.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Curiosity_Dec
StringTable.String: Initially outfitted to examine the universe, we quickly determined that it also needed to be able to defend itself against what it found.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Perserverance_Dec
StringTable.String: The Perseverance is the symbol of our progress and was launched with a worldwide celebration.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Gaze_Dec
StringTable.String: A prototype laser and shields large enough to defend an entire fleet make this a dangerous command ship.

StringTable.Label: Commander_HivebaseOne_Dec
StringTable.String: Do not be fooled by the weak weapons and lack of defenses. This is a floating drone platform that can battle entire enemy fleets.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Apex_Dec
StringTable.String: Our military flagship. Gifted by a trillionaire military contractor. We only need to find someone worthy to command it.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Sickle_Dec
StringTable.String: This far-reaching missile destroyer can destroy enemy fleets nearly a solar system away.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Festron7_Dec
StringTable.String: This far-reaching missile destroyer can destroy enemy fleets nearly a solar system away.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Drengin1_Dec
StringTable.String: A tactical AI allows this ship to integrate itself easily into larger fleets.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Festron1_Dec
StringTable.String: A tactical AI allows this ship to integrate itself easily into larger fleets.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Drengin2_Dec
StringTable.String: Less of a ship and more of a prototype laser with an engine attached. The more experience the crew gets with the laser, the more powerful it will become.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Drengin3_Dec
StringTable.String: Initially designed to counter rebellions this warship is equally adept at forcing good behavior from our workers and our enemies.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Drengin4_Dec
StringTable.String: Loaded with a vast array of recording equipment this ship is able to record every victory in great detail. And play it back for those who question our strength.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Drengin5_Dec
StringTable.String: This legendary ship is feared by our enemies for its ability to quickly recover from battle and fight again.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Festron5_Dec
StringTable.String: This legendary ship is feared by our enemies for its ability to quickly recover from battle and fight again.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Drengin6_Dec
StringTable.String: This powerful warship is a forge for munitions during times of war and production during times of peace.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Drengin7_Dec
StringTable.String: This flagship is a symbol of our empire. The sight of it inspires our citizens and soliders alike.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Navigator1_Dec
StringTable.String: Able to travel to the edge of the universe, and transmit back what it finds.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Navigator2_Dec
StringTable.String: Initially outfitted to examine the universe, we quickly determined that it also needed to be able to defend itself against what it found.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Navigator3_Dec
StringTable.String: The limitations of physical space are more flexible than we might believe.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Navigator4_Dec
StringTable.String: By deconstructing matter this ship can create new materials. But the process should be done far away from civilized worlds.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Navigator5_Dec
StringTable.String: We applaud the scientific analysis that this ship is able to perform after a battle, even if the process is rather gruesome.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Navigator6_Dec
StringTable.String: We have always desired to live among the stars. The fortunate inhabitants of this generational ship are able to experience it.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Navigator7_Dec
StringTable.String: Fully self-sustaining this ship is able to travel to the edge of the universe, and destroy anything it encounters along the way.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Festron2_Dec
StringTable.String: Initially designed to recover raw materials from asteroids, the process was even easier when used on enemy ships.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Festron3_Dec
StringTable.String: A nightmarish egg chamber fills the hull of this ship. By exposing captured crew to the newly hatched we can convert them to our cause.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Festron4_Dec
StringTable.String: We applaud the scientific analysis that this ship is able to perform after a battle, even if the process is rather gruesome.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Festron6_Dec
StringTable.String: This ship has many names amongst different civilizations; Werewolf, Blood Angel, Falling Star. But no matter the name, it is always spoken of in fear.

StringTable.Label: Commander_EndlessZeros_Dec
StringTable.String: Every aspect of this ship is automated. Making it easy for a single commander to control.

StringTable.Label: Commander_VoidInTime_Dec
StringTable.String: Also known as "Wavemaker" and "Chariot" this ship leads its fleet, pulling them ahead as it warps space around them.

StringTable.Label: Commander_SufferingWithin_Dec
StringTable.String: This ship was discovered after the entire crew committed suicide. Despite its reputation, it has been repurposed.

StringTable.Label: Commander_BeforeCreation_Dec
StringTable.String: Designed to empower an entire fleet.

StringTable.Label: Commander_AfterDeath_Dec
StringTable.String: Designed to defend an entire fleet.

StringTable.Label: Commander_InfiniteResolve_Dec
StringTable.String: A warship and a cannon production foundry.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Nameless_Dec
StringTable.String: A repair ship so advanced it is able to rebuild nearby ships while traveling and during battle.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Appeleur_Dec
StringTable.String: Onboard construction allows an almost endless supply of probes to be sent out into the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Wisp_Dec
StringTable.String: A legendary escape ship particularly suited to outrun Drengin fleets.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Puca_Dec
StringTable.String: Enemy fleets have been drawn out to deep space attempting to attack the nimble Puca.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Loireag_Dec
StringTable.String: A legendary ship initially designed to provide housing for the rapidly growing crew.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Harpazein_Dec
StringTable.String: Also called "Dreamlight" or "Mist" this ship's crew has reported visions and vivid dreams.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Dullahan_Dec
StringTable.String: Generations are born and spend their entire lives within the intense training bays on this ship. The first time they touch land it is as part of an invasion.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Gruff_Dec
StringTable.String: A floating forge more than a warship, able to produce an entire fleet given the time and materials.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Xeloxi1_Dec
StringTable.String: Eufemie was a famous Xeloxi raider. Though she disappeared on a Refuge port, her legendary ship remains.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Xeloxi2_Dec
StringTable.String: This ships weapons are calibrated to immobilize an enemy rather than destroy. Often allowing the enemy ship to be captured.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Xeloxi3_Dec
StringTable.String: Called "Blood Tooth" among the pirates. This ship is known to hide within asteroid belts and launch missiles at vulnerable targets.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Xeloxi4_Dec
StringTable.String: There is a monument on Refuge that lists the ships destroyed by Killigrew. As the list grows, so does the the legend.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Xeloxi5_Dec
StringTable.String: An alien engine allows the ship to drop out of real space, through a pocket universe and out a few light weeks away. Which the crew uses to escape battles.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Xeloxi6_Dec
StringTable.String: Haunted by those killed in a brutal massacre. No matter what is done those spirits remain, and no matter what is done to the ship it remains as well.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Xeloxi7_Dec
StringTable.String: Home to the worst criminals of the Xeloxi empire, and many others. Murders are frequent, but insurrections are contained due to a security system that points inwards instead of out.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Iridium1_Dec
StringTable.String: Originally a precursor reclamation ship. It has since been repurposed to survey anomalies and defend itself.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Iridium2_Dec
StringTable.String: While the exo-corporations competed for the highest and most luxurious resorts, Panetta surpassed them all by creating one in space.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Iridium3_Dec
StringTable.String: Protecting trade lanes is key to the survival of the Corporate Sector. And no ship has done more toward that purpose than this one.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Iridium4_Dec
StringTable.String: Harondin's personal ship was where he began to build his considerable fortune. He no longer has time to captain it himself, but it is still an impressive ship.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Iridium5_Dec
StringTable.String: An unusual ship in that it allows anyone to board regardless of species or alliance. This causes numerous issues, but it also created a central marketplace that rivals those on any world.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Iridium6_Dec
StringTable.String: Originally intended to transport and quickly deploy city sized trade events. It was just as easy to transport soldiers as it was salesmen.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Iridium7_Dec
StringTable.String: A galactic wonder often compared to a fully functional city on its own. Generations of citizens live out their lives on this ship and catering to the visitors to nearby worlds.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Arcean1_Dec
StringTable.String: Originally designed for an Arcean wargame, the Valiant was quickly redeployed for more practical purposes.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Arcean2_Dec
StringTable.String: Ship of the Arcean Council of Judges and capable of delivering justice on their behalf.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Arcean3_Dec
StringTable.String: An alien ship of unknown origin. The Arceans found and equipped it to serve their purposes.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Arcean4_Dec
StringTable.String: This ship was expelled from a dimensional rift. It appears to be of Arcean design, but from undiscovered technology.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Arcean5_Dec
StringTable.String: Lord Vega's legendary warship. Its appearance above a world is both inspiring and terrifying.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Arcean6_Dec
StringTable.String: The Elysium only accepts the most talented warriors among its crew. Many aspire to one day join its ranks.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Arcean7_Dec
StringTable.String: Flagship for the Arcean fleet. As its legend grows, so does its power.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Drath1_Dec
StringTable.String: Called 'the Meteorite' by Drath admirers this ship was a prototype developed to explore space and armed to deal with anything it found.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Drath2_Dec
StringTable.String: A prototype ship designed to deal with any threats it may encounter.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Drath3_Dec
StringTable.String: Equipped with enough life support to keep a single commander alive perpetually.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Drath4_Dec
StringTable.String: Inspired by a Drath swamp moth that is able to control its victims and force them to fight the thralls of other moths.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Drath5_Dec
StringTable.String: Originally designed as a mercenary ship the Drath could loan to other empires. In the end they decided to keep it for themselves.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Drath6_Dec
StringTable.String: Drath flagship and heart of their command.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Drath7_Dec
StringTable.String: Many believe this ship is only a rumor. It has never been seen in battle, mostly because it destroys enemy fleets before it gets close to them.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Baratak1_Dec
StringTable.String: The fertile seeds grown here can be used to germinate nearby worlds.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Baratak2_Dec
StringTable.String: The living hull of this ships heals almost as quickly as damage is taken.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Baratak3_Dec
StringTable.String: A legendary transport ship that any colony would be glad to have nearby.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Baratak4_Dec
StringTable.String: There is a sentience at the heart of this ship. And though most of the Baratak heartwells are calm and patient, this one dreams of war.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Baratak5_Dec
StringTable.String: The most notable feature of this ship is the ability to produce living atmospheric filters that improve all nearby worlds.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Baratak6_Dec
StringTable.String: A bastion of life and growth.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Baratak7_Dec
StringTable.String: The mothership of the Baratak empire.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Resistance1_Dec
StringTable.String: A quick attack ship designed to keep Resistance borders safe.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Resistance2_Dec
StringTable.String: A modest ship whose attack grows with level.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Resistance3_Dec
StringTable.String: A legendary fleet defender designed to support allied fleets.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Resistance4_Dec
StringTable.String: Sometimes called the "Eyes of Heaven". This ship builds a subspace relay network as it travels, increasing its sensor range over time.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Resistance5_Dec
StringTable.String: A ship that excels not because of innovative technology, but an incredibly talented team devoted to their work and each other.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Resistance6_Dec
StringTable.String: The foundry on board this warship can service an entire fleet, and keep them ready for battle.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Resistance7_Dec
StringTable.String: The Resistance flagship and core of their military strength.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Altarian1_Dec
StringTable.String: The wandering ship of the Altarians is known to bring luck to the remote worlds it visits, as well as securing transport to and from them.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Altarian2_Dec
StringTable.String: This ship enhances the psychic powers of the commander, allowing them to detect and examine foreign objects in a way few other species can.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Altarian3_Dec
StringTable.String: With a unique ability to tie into local communication and data channels this ship is almost immediately reinforced when it is within its borders. And vulnerable when it is outside of them.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Altarian4_Dec
StringTable.String: A failed attempt to be able to witness the future instead created a system able to see the past. Less useful, but still valuable when surveying anomalies.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Altarian5_Dec
StringTable.String: Also called the Queen, the Altarian Cloak or SkyGlaive. This legendary warship reinforces both nearby fleets and worlds.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Altarian6_Dec
StringTable.String: This ship is home to the Altarian War Council. And though they prefer not to engage in war their influence is far reaching.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Altarian7_Dec
StringTable.String: Altarian psychics cover a wide range of abilities. Those that can kill with their powers either have their abilities severed, or are assigned to crew this ship.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Torian1_Dec
StringTable.String: The Torians discovered a dead god, a floating mechanical titan in deep space. The titan was destroyed beyond repair, except for the eye, which they fashioned into a ship.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Torian2_Dec
StringTable.String: The ship the Torian's used to flee from the Drengin. Despite the Torian appearance it is actually a stolen Drengin ship.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Torian3_Dec
StringTable.String: Often called Starbubble or Slingshot this ship was designed for speed and can quickly respond to emergencies.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Torian4_Dec
StringTable.String: The antimatter that powers this ship's engine is flawed causing wakes in temporal space when the ship moves. The crew has learned to use these wakes to slow enemy fleets.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Torian5_Dec
StringTable.String: A wide variety of recording equipment allow the Torian civilization, and many others, to watch the battles of this legendary ship as they occur.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Torian6_Dec
StringTable.String: First designed as an escape ship for the growing Torian population. Now it has been outfitted as a warship instead.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Torian7_Dec
StringTable.String: The Torian dream of living among the stars, no longer vulnerable to invasion or environmental collapse. This ship is the first move toward that dream.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Manti1_Dec
StringTable.String: The sovereign's personal transport has an impressive onboard lab. It is unknown if that's for investigation or Babble's personal experiments.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Manti2_Dec
StringTable.String: A fierce, though small, warship with surprisingly powerful weapons. Originally designed to deal with guarded anomalies.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Manti3_Dec
StringTable.String: Designed to be almost invisible to detection and with an impressive sensor range of its own it is well suited to explore anomalies in distant space.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Manti4_Dec
StringTable.String: Designed as a habitat for the lost generation of Manti. And once they are found, to provide enough defenses to ensure that they aren't lost again.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Manti5_Dec
StringTable.String: This ship wasn't constructed, but discovered deep in Brachyura's ocean. Though it wasn't Manti technology they were able to activate it and put it to use.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Manti6_Dec
StringTable.String: This ship is a collection of autonomous, specialized capsules that together are able to perform space travel, initiate combat and sustain a crew.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Manti7_Dec
StringTable.String: Designed to lay claim to the anomalies in the deepest reaches of space, and destroy anything it finds there.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Krynn1_Dec
StringTable.String: Infinite range allows this probe to spread the message of the Way out to the farthest reaches of the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Krynn2_Dec
StringTable.String: Designed to collect religious artifacts for the Way, this ship is equally well suited to analyzing mundane anomalies.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Krynn3_Dec
StringTable.String: Designed to defend the sacred worlds of the Way, or destroy those that threaten them.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Krynn4_Dec
StringTable.String: This legendary warship is the subject of daily benedictions by the Way and all of its members.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Krynn5_Dec
StringTable.String: Used as the symbol of faith within the Way. When not involved in missions it often hosts delegations and the most important religious conferences.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Krynn6_Dec
StringTable.String: This ship is fully crewed by clergy. But that doesn't make the warship any less formidable in battle.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Krynn7_Dec
StringTable.String: This far-reaching missile destroyer can destroy enemy fleets nearly a solar system away.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Iconian1_Dec
StringTable.String: Designed for quick response to enemy threats the first sign this ship has arrived is usually a flurry of laser fire.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Iconian2_Dec
StringTable.String: Little is known about this mysterious ship or its crew.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Iconian3_Dec
StringTable.String: Typically patroling Iconian borders and allowing its powerful sensors to detect anything beyond.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Iconian4_Dec
StringTable.String: Iso's personal warship. Occasionally he loans it out to able commanders in times of need.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Iconian5_Dec
StringTable.String: Originally a deep space lab, it was eventually outfitted with engines and weapons to protect the technological secrets it contains.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Iconian6_Dec
StringTable.String: The new promise of the Iconian civilization. Vast clone chambers allows both spur the growth of nearby worlds and help guarantee that the Iconians will survive another extinction level event.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Iconian7_Dec
StringTable.String: This ship is the flagship of the Grey, a Iconian military division given authority to operate independently of Iconian oversight or restriction.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Onyx1_Dec
StringTable.String: Unable to give chase to pirate raiders, the Arkose is more than happy to allow its missiles to do it instead.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Onyx2_Dec
StringTable.String: The guns from this ship were recovered from a crashed alien vessel. They are centuries old, but the Hive recently figured out how to power them.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Onyx3_Dec
StringTable.String: The powerful lasers on the Breccia are actually mining lasers. But they work just as well for cutting through enemy hulls.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Onyx4_Dec
StringTable.String: Powerful missiles accompany a point defense system so advanced that it can protect an entire fleet.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Onyx5_Dec
StringTable.String: For the Hive, Promethion is the source of life. And the inner chambers of this ship are able to reverse the reaction and transmute the life of defeated enemies into Promethion.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Onyx6_Dec
StringTable.String: More of a mobile starbase than a ship, Hornfels is able to assist in the production of nearby worlds. And defend them if needed.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Onyx7_Dec
StringTable.String: This flagship of the Hive is sacred and many say it exposure to Promethion has caused it to become sentient.

StringTable.Label: DreadLordTiny_Dec
StringTable.String: One of the thousands of Dreadlord scout ships.

StringTable.Label: DreadLordSmall_Dec
StringTable.String: Tactical fighters intended to decimate enemies or identify hardened targets.

StringTable.Label: DreadLordMedium_Dec
StringTable.String: A powerful warship whose presence causes organic life anxiety and nightmares.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Crystalline1_Dec
StringTable.String: Developed in response to an unprovoked attack. It miraculously survived the battle and remains a symbol of strength and hope.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Crystalline2_Dec
StringTable.String: A criminal syndicate created this warship before turning on each other, leaving only this functional warship behind.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Crystalline3_Dec
StringTable.String: This ship accepts telepathic commands as well as haptic controls. Making it dangerous both to its enemies and the pilot connected to it in battle.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Crystalline4_Dec
StringTable.String: Designed initially for a wealthy trader and outfitted with the best of everything. It is as beautiful as it is deadly.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Crystalline5_Dec
StringTable.String: Often called the Little Moon as it is frequently seen in the night sky above the homeworld it guards.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Crystalline6_Dec
StringTable.String: An entire space ecosystem, for those that have no need for food. Entire decks are dedicated to entertainment, education and manufacturing.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Crystalline7_Dec
StringTable.String: Intended to be a diplomatic vessel for visting neighboring civilizations. A significant armament ensures that diplomacy remains peaceful.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Korath1_Dec
StringTable.String: Bears the scars and battlemarks from hundreds of battles.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Korath2_Dec
StringTable.String: This frigate has been modified to put weapon hardpoints in every possible place, including the former landing gear compartment. Because of this the crew has to be shuttled to the ship.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Korath3_Dec
StringTable.String: Infamously part of the Korath vanguard, this ship has been engineered to possess an unprecedented power-to-weight ratio, compromising its cargo hold for an additional reactor.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Korath4_Dec
StringTable.String: Has been equipped with a state-of-the-art combat simulator with data on the galaxies greatest warriors.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Korath5_Dec
StringTable.String: Outfitted with a revolutionary field generator that hypercharges any kinetic projectiles fired through it, drastically increasing their destructive potential.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Korath6_Dec
StringTable.String: A legendary battleship with a storied history of decisive victories.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Korath7_Dec
StringTable.String: A fearsome artillery ship with a crude projectile propulsion system. This system is dangerous and requires extreme maintenance but allows the cannons to fire at theoretically infinite range.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Seeing1_Dec
StringTable.String: This ship has state of the art sensors so that passengers can see through the walls to the outside at all times.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Seeing2_Dec
StringTable.String: Known for its numerous beam weapons, can unleash a dazzling light show that can be seen from kilometers away in space.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Seeing3_Dec
StringTable.String: This ship is equipped with specialized equipment for recording various anomaly phenomena for future viewing.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Seeing4_Dec
StringTable.String: Equipped with focused lense technology, which work by harnessing and amplifying the energy output of each ship's beam weapons, thereby significantly increasing their attack power.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Seeing5_Dec
StringTable.String: Possesses a sophisticated vulnerability detection system, capable of revealing the most minute flaws in enemy armor, paving the way for devastating, efficient attacks..

StringTable.Label: Commander_Seeing6_Dec
StringTable.String: This ship is renowned throughout the cosmos for its advanced targeting system that can accurately track multiple enemy ships simultaneously across vast distances.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Seeing7_Dec
StringTable.String: With its extraordinary sensor ranges, this ship has the unique ability to peer deep into the galaxy, offering unparalleled views and early detection of distant celestial objects and phenomena.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Irradiated1_Dec
StringTable.String: This ship is notorious for its continuous squirming and abrupt twitching, making it an unpredictable target.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Irradiated2_Dec
StringTable.String: Little is known about this beast's internal organs since no instruments can penetrate its incredibly dense skin.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Irradiated3_Dec
StringTable.String: Stare down the bow of this beast, and you will understand why they call her teeth.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Irradiated4_Dec
StringTable.String: This beast has a unique genetic condition causing constant metamorphosis of its skin and carapace. Its hitpoints are randomaly modified between -50% and + 50% after each victory.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Irradiated5_Dec
StringTable.String: The creature this ship was fused with has parasites that she can shed on command, this makes for a devestating invasion force.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Irradiated6_Dec
StringTable.String: This beast boasts exceptional eyesight, enabling it to spot and target enemies from incredible distances with ease.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Irradiated7_Dec
StringTable.String: A genuine cosmic horror, this Leviathan embodies the terrifying possibilities of merging the organic with the mechanical. After a battle is finished, it digests the debris and disabled ships from the battlefield.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Moth1_Dec
StringTable.String: The D'Auroth was the first ship commissioned with the intent to explore distant stars for new life.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Moth2_Dec
StringTable.String: The Due' Lumineras was the first ship to utilize technology that changed interior lighting to match the season, vastly improving the space-faring experience.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Moth3_Dec
StringTable.String: In battle, the Due' Soleary is viewed as the star of conflict -a large body quickly burning any that get too close. At least so says the battle-averse Advance.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Moth4_Dec
StringTable.String: The Due' clipse is not formally recognized by the Advance, and no records are kept. As far as most Phalenoids know, the ship doesn't exist.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Moth5_Dec
StringTable.String: A heavy transport ship, the D'Comtaut is boasted as the most secure way to travel. It was initially designed to assist diplomatic missions.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Moth6_Dec
StringTable.String: A ceremonial flagship, the D'Radieut is the star of any fleet. The ship's slow move speed and heavy armor make it ideally suited for defense.

StringTable.Label: Commander_Moth7_Dec
StringTable.String: A surprisingly nimble flagship. The Due' Cles was designed to respond quickly to calls for aid across known star systems.
